column3: Lali-ho! So, who are you s'posed to be? <Switch(PlayerParameter(71))><Case(1)>Some kind of traveler?</Case><Case(2)>Some kind of traveler?</Case><Case(3)>I ain't never seen a dwarf like you before.</Case><Case(4)>Some kind of traveler?</Case><Case(5)>Some kind of traveler?</Case><Case(6)>Some kind of traveler?</Case><Case(7)>Some kind of traveler?</Case><Case(8)>Some kind of traveler?</Case></Switch> Well, at least you ain't a Tholl...
What kind of place is this?
Me? I'm a proud dwarf of the Goggs! The name's Gamgg, second daughter of Kagigg, daughter of Xolagg!
It's my job to oversee our supplies of beard oil, and give pointers to them what's having a hard time maintaining their whiskers. Aye, our beards are second only to our honor!
Unlike them limp, wispy mops worn by the <Emphasis>Tholls</Emphasis>, our whiskers are bushy and shapely and shiny! And they smell good, too!
This here is Komra! And you have the honor of standing amongst the sons and daughters of the mighty Gogg family!
You seem unfamiliar with our ways, so I'd best tell you straight: we don't take our beards off for no one what isn't family! Anyone as breaks that law is run out of the village!

As for trades, there ain't no one better than a Gogg at mining or smithing. We've got automata to help with the digging, aye, but we also built a few for battle. If them bastard Tholls come looking for trouble, then they'll bloody well find it!
